name: reanalyze
description: Analyzers for Dead Code/Types and termination

scripts.install:examples: (cd examples/deadcode && npm install) & (cd examples/termination && npm install)
scripts.build:examples: (cd examples/deadcode && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run analyze) & (cd examples/termination && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run analyze)

author: Cristiano Calcagno
